attributes.action: Compensate contaminated NHS transfusion Hepatitus C victims (Natural clearers) denied compensation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many like me have been given Hepatitus C in infected NHS blood transfusions pre 1988,and through unfair criteria legislation in the ex gratia payments scheme issue by the DOH  Skipton Fund are now denied any compensation whatsoever by the Govt for being "natural clearers"and clearing the disease in its acute phase.
This is grossly unfair.
We were all given the same disease.
Over 1,000 people have already died from this disease.
Many like me have suffered enough socially,financially and emotionally already. 
We urge the Govt to acknowledge us and do the decent thing and award us our rightful compensation,even if it is a lower ammount to the others, as the Govt has a moral and financial obligation to us all in this issue.
